unambiguous_direct: Robot, please take the cabbage, bell pepper, potato, and green onion from the kitchen counter, and wash them thoroughly using the sink. Use the mixer to blend the vegetables and cottage cheese together, until the mixture is smooth and creamy. After that, take the ham and bacon from the fridge, and cut them into small pieces using the kitchen knife. Add the ham and bacon to the mixing bowl, and mix them well with the vegetable and cottage cheese mixture. Finally, take the oven-safe baking dish, and spread the mixture evenly on it. Sprinkle some shredded mozzarella cheese on top of the mixture, and place the baking dish in the oven. Bake the dish at 375 degrees Fahrenheit for 20-25 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the mixture is hot and cooked through. Once the dish is ready, take it out of the oven, and let it cool down for a few minutes. Serve it on the kitchen table, along with a cup of black tea.
